alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:23AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, north central Prentiss, Alcorn, southeastern Hardeman, McNairy, southwestern Hardin and southwestern Chester Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 722 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Masseyville, or 8 miles west of Selmer, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Selmer, Pickwick Landing State Park, Big Hill Pond State Park, Burnsville, Glen, Pickwick Dam, Masseyville, Theo, Shiloh, Pocahontas, Pineflat, Leedy, Robertson, McNairy, Farmington, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Eastview and Michie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
